about_the_game:
It’s 1999 and there is a rumour going around. If two people confess their feelings for one another at the turn of the millennium, they will be destined to be together in a thousand year fairytale romance! Who will choose you on New Year's eve?

Welcome to Escafeld College, the school in which you spend the next year meeting a cast of 13 unique characters. Taking them to a variety of locations and making new friendships along the way!

Building your skills is going to be vital to maintaining your standing at the college and with the cast. A delicate balance that will allow you to grow closer to the people you like. While also keeping you in the good graces of everyone else you meet at Escafeld.

But don’t take it too easy because rumours spread fast! They can be sweet, silly or sinister. Hell hath no fury like an Escafeld Student scorned.

Millennium Whisper is a one of a kind experience using AI.

Rather than the standard dry AI experiences trained on large sets of data from the internet, the cast in Millennium Whisper is played by AI that are exclusively trained on in-house creative work.

The possibilities are endless, and the way you play the game will be entirely unique to you. Each of our (13) characters has their own unique personality traits, likes, dislikes and behaviours. In Millennium Whisper you can have complex relationships and deep conversations, or enjoy a more light hearted experience, having fun with the characters.

Play the game your way, and write your own story.

🎀- Intricately drawn pixel art cast:

Game takes place entirely in a pixel aesthetic with a pixel art cast, environments and UI!

🎀- Ground breaking AI Conversation System:

A new approach to AI in video games. Converse with the cast like never before. With an AI trained by real actors portraying the cast!

🎀- Manage relationships:

What you say matters. With realistic conversations the cast feel the full range of emotions. You can upset them, make them jealous and more!

🎀- And battle through rumours:

Be aware, rumours can spread through Escafeld College quickly! The cast can spread rumours about you, and they could be good or bad!

🎀- RPG Stat System:

Choose how you spend your free time, and build your stats. These will shape the experience you have at Escafeld College!

🎀- Completely Offline:

Unlike other AI games that require you to be online, Millennium Whisper is entirely offline!

🎀- 13 Character Cast:

Each with their own look, personality, interests, and more. They won’t make it easy for you, and you’ll quickly find yourself immersed in the challenge of trying to Rizz-Em-Up!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, version 1903 (10.0; Build 18362), and newer
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 - 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: 12 GB VRAM or higher
